item.description:
We want to keep up our jogging as long as we can!

The HS lights may or may not be on, so this could be dark. Only "rules" don't leave someone at the track alone after dark and check in so others know when you leave. If you have a headlamp, feel free to wear it. :)

We can keep this going as long as members want to meet and we don't have snow or ice on the track!

Monday and Wednesday nights
6:00pm
Braintree High School
Track
Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

Organizer(s): Julie

Min/Max: none

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do my best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 2pm.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Time at the Track, Joggers, Walkers and Runners
